website_summaries.verdict: While the JBL Reflect Mini 2 could sound a little better for the money, I liked its design and fit.
pros: This lightweight Bluetooth sports headphone fits snugly and feels comfortable
It delivers decent battery life and has a reflective cord and a nighttime safety feature
cons: The sound could be a little better at this price

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Awesome Beautiful Product - no kidding.
customer_reviews.text: I have the JBL Reflect Mini. And I love it. I read the reviews about the Mini2, said to myself let me invest a 100 bucks, am curious to try the better version of what's already good, and o'boy.. That Mini2 blew my mind away. Sound quality is second to none, the fit in the ear is even better than the Reflect Mini, it really fits like a glove (no pun intended), and when u twist it in ur ear, acts as if it has a noise cancellation - no joke! I love this Mini 2, I don't regret it a single bit, the next thing am gonna do, is post my Reflect Mini for sale hehehe.. Super highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.text: I cannot imagine a worse experience. I used these headphones for 2 weeks. After one week the right earphone started crackling. After 2 weeks they stopped working altogether. I never used them in the rain, and they were never exposed to any harsh conditions. Sometimes electronics have problems, that's understood. But the JBL (Harmon) was so terrible about the support. They bounced me around the globe to different service centers with no one willing to lift a finger or deal with a faulty product. Finally I received an 80% refund from Amazon and will now buy Bose. BEWARE and DO NOT buy JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Brenden

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life, Modest Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It has a great battery life. The ear buds routinely hold a charge through 4-5 workouts, unlike my last pair that barely lasted through 2. The ear buds stay in the ear well during strenuous workouts. My only complaint is that the music is not very loud and the bass is lacking. The sound quality is not bad when the ear buds are pushed deeply into the ear, however they do not remain deeply embedded during the workout so you lose the bass and some of the volume when they loosen up. Overall I would recommend them for purchase unless you are looking for ear buds with loud volume and heavy bass.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Young

customer_reviews.title: Great but defective after only 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are great... when they function. After about 3 weeks with these the right side started producing static to the extent that it made it impossible to have it in my ear at all. They definitely stay in your ears while running though, and the battery life is great. It just didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Lulpiglet

customer_reviews.title: MAJOR downgrade for reflect mini 1
customer_reviews.text: these are awful compared to their predecessor in just about every single way: 1. sound quality is horrible (mid/low range/bass is non-existent) 2. they volume/power control piece is bigger and clunky looking now, feels cheap 3. the wire loom between the two ear pieces feels low quality and is impossible to iron out- results in it always looking awkward when on your head 4. the ear pieces themselves are bigger- stick out from your ears more- looks terrible- not to mention the color scheme (silver, black, red) is not as clean as the first version of the reflect mini Would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: arthur lyssenko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money
customer_reviews.text: These head phones have great battery life, great sound for their size, and provide great noise canceling with the way they snuggly fit into your ear. I have had no issues with phone conversations with my pair, as others have indicated. This is my second pair of JBLs and is a significant improvement over the original reflect mini bt I had before. I wear these in the gym five days a week and listen to both music and audio books on them throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded iphone to a 7+ so needed a Bluetooth headphone. The cord goes behind the neck but since its not attached to the iphone/me, I have to be careful I don’t lose it lol. Great sound, came with a small pouch that fits great in my small everyday purse. Only complaint is the charger is small and a little tough to work it. Other than that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aress

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: I really really liked this headset. It stays in place at the gym, even upside-down. It sounds great and the battery lasts forever. Until Now. It won't take a charge. I tried multiple chargers and cables. 3 seconds after plugging in the cable the red charging light goes out like it's full. Turn on the headset and it says battery is low It won't stay on for more than a minute now. Tech support was helpful until it becomes known it's 4 months out of warranty. Coincidence? IDK. They gave me a 30% discount on a new device so I guess that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily for cycling. I wanted a few specific features: Secure in the ear. Decent sound quality. Not worried about them flying off. There are great. They fit very securely in my ear and let me bump tunes while I cruise on gravel roads all over. Only issues: wish they let in a bit more ambient noise. I usually ride with only one in and the other tucked around a helmet strap unless I know there will be no cars. I also sometimes use them for work calls and the microphone seems to be much better than my Bose QC2 microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Max Keilson

customer_reviews.title: Great battery and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: No idea how these are getting bad reviews but they are fantastic headphones! Nice compact size, great sound, great battery life, and stays put in ears during activity. Bluetooth signal goes about 75ft before breaking up, which is very far compared to other Bluetooth devices.
customer_reviews.author: Clayster

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Warning, do not get scammed by this company. This product works fine through its first battery life then it never works again, even after recharged. It doesn’t connect to any device again. I’ve contacted their support 3 times and they won’t respond. Literally the worst product you can ever purchase from an even worse company that won’t be accountable for their products. We should question Amazon too for continuing to allow fraudulent products to be sold on their site. Whatever you do, don’t purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: James Veraldi

customer_reviews.title: Survived the washing machine
customer_reviews.text: I just got home late from work and my clothes were completely dirty. Decided to throw them in with the laundry I had piled up and get that going before I went to bed. Totally blanked on the fact that I left my headphones in my pocket. Thought they would have been dead when I realized I had just put these through the washer and dryer. Checked for a pulse: it booted right up and there was absolutely no loss in quality. Good job JBL! Originally bought for a half marathon and these headphones were fantastic. Great sound quality, battery life, and stayed in the ears
customer_reviews.author: James Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very good product 👌
customer_reviews.text: I returned 3 cordless ear plugs as all of them had same issue as they wouldn't fit properly to my ears. Then I purchased this JBL with very small wire and worked perfectly for me. I like the design, sound quality and noise cancellation. Pairs quickly and good battery life. Charges quickly. Only missing item I see if next/forward buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Atit

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds, syncing is a little iffy
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace the earbuds that came with my GPS watch. Overall, they work really well and hold a battery well. They do feel a little like they suction in to my ears, which can get uncomfortable on long runs, but for the most part they stay in pretty well, once you size them appropriately for your ears (they do come with 3 sizes so that's helpful). Sometimes they don't sync to my watch quickly, and I find that I have to turn them off and on a few times until they sync. That's been the only slight issue. Otherwise, all good.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with Pixel 2
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you are using a Pixel 2 running android 10. It will not pair with your device. I have found others who are using other phones with android 10 who are having trouble as well. I couldn't talk about the other features because I couldn't even start to evaluate the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but sensitive microphone
customer_reviews.text: VERY good at noise cancelling. Great sound. Perfect for working out! But the microphone seems to be too good at picking up background sounds so it makes phone calls difficult because the other caller can hear everything you do (opening drawers, etc).
customer_reviews.author: keifernavey

customer_reviews.title: WARNING TO ANDROID 10 USERS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this product will not pair via Bluetooth to any device running Android 10. Tried on my Google Pixel 2 XL and would not show as an available device when trying to pair. Looked on online forums and it looks like JBL knows that this is an issue, but doesn't care ...shameful. DO NOT BUY ANDROID USERS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and noise cancellation for office use
customer_reviews.text: These ear headphones are great. Great job of cancelling noise around the office, sound is good, clear and music sounds good (for average listener). My ears do hurt after a while, must depend on each person's ear size. Like that I can remove the silicone pieces to clean them. Would have prefered the gray carrying pouch closing fully, side stays open. Very happy overall with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas gift for a picky 16 yo to use at the gym. She loves them and says they sound great. Battery life is awesome too. She had been using my Bose sport wireless ear buds so that’s saying something.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carreiro

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Pixels!
customer_reviews.text: Note that due to some compatibility issue with Google, these headphones won't pair with a Pixel and some other Android phones. It did not work with my Pixel 3.
customer_reviews.author: Douglyss Giuliana

customer_reviews.title: They are just right!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Lightweight. Fast recharging. Makes doing housework a dream! My husband gave me some for my birthday and we have a set to our daughter who loves them too! Tomorrow I will try them out in a long International flight! I expect they will do well for me!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: The worst earphones!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Guys. Don’t buy this item!!!!! I was so excited to use them. I saw some bad reviews but also good ones. So I was hoping they would be great. They are THE WORST!!!! I can’t even pair them with my iPhone. I charged it and can’t turn it off... the directions are no help. Trust me - look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes!  With Garmin Fenix 5x Plus
customer_reviews.text: Pairs easily with Fenix 5x Plus. Great for all fitness exercise
customer_reviews.author: Stephen V. Tannen

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: For 45 dollars you really can’t get a better deal! The experience from the unboxing to the pairing is smooth. Solid pair of headphones for literally anything 4.8/5
customer_reviews.author: MD Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Just dont buy them.
customer_reviews.text: Worst set of earphones I've ever paid for. Showed up dead on arrival. Wouldnt pair with Any device I have access to. Including two cell phones and two desktop computers. Dont waste time waiting or your earned money on these. Feels bad I used to like JBL. They look nice but sadly not heavy enough for a paper weight either.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. Only one ear bud works periodically. Should’ve returned but it started working though inconsistently. If you dong mind a loud buzzing in your ear but it otherwise steer clear. Quality rating F
customer_reviews.author: erk

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection really kills my VIBE
customer_reviews.text: The sound cuts out and it happens frequently. Ive updated my phone and music apps and have concluded its just the headphones. For the short period that i can listen to music using these headphones, the sound is great but its frustrating having the music stop and start playing over and over. I'm currently deployed so its really disappointing that I have no way of returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of JBL headphones I have purchased. The first pair stopped working in 1 ear and the second just stopped working altogether after 3 months. Don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gail J.

customer_reviews.title: Wireless headset
customer_reviews.text: I've had one for many years I bought this as a Christmas gift for son-in-law it is fantastic out of all the buds I've had this 1 ways surpass all of them good battery life couldn't ask for anything better
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best ear buds I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Love em! Second pair I've owned. Great sound, calls are crisp and clear, lost the first set, had to get another.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous battery life. Excellent sound and build quality. For the price its an adequate pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: buffcanuck83

customer_reviews.title: Not visible for PC with Windows 10. Not visible for Android devices.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just disappointed. It doesn't work with my Pixel 4 and with my PC. Really frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Not Compatible With Windows 10 Pro BT
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the sole purpose of pairing with my office workstation (Lenovo Thinkpad with Windows X Pro), but the Bluetooth Software/Drivers in Windows X Pro are not compatible with these headphones BT firmware....searched all over internet for solution but no luck. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: James Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Not an audiophile. Used while cycling. Can hear enough traffic. Connects and holds blue tooth signal without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: CLF/MG

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: This earphones are the best bluetooth earphones I've purchased. They work great, are great at blocking outside sound and has almost none to no soundleak. I see myself with these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working less than 3 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These completely stopped working for me less than 3 months after purchasing. They will no longer even charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stays put
customer_reviews.text: Sound could use more base, but after a while you forget about that. I use these during workouts and running and they don't move, which was the most important thing for me. Battery life has been good too. They have been reliable. Not amazing, but reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Jbl ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: They last a very long time on phone calls and on my runs with music .
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: NOT compatible with all Android devices
customer_reviews.text: Per customer support the Reflect Mini 2 earbuds are NOT compatible with all Android devices, they recommended I return mine. Unfortunate because I like the way that they fit and sound. If they were compatible with my phone I would definitely keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Product was not a functional item for a lengthy period
customer_reviews.text: The item didn't last but 2 months before I experience problems with having to reset the headphone to get it to work properly. Then the next time, the headphone wouldn't even turn on and work. Durability issues. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: gkruger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance - reliable - a real workhorse
customer_reviews.text: After many months of use both in the gym and now in 3 months of COVID-19 video conferencing....these babies really perform. Great sound quality, they stay put in my ears and the battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: BK Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Hard Pass
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waist your time. Bought these as a Christmas gift and 4 months later one side has given out. Manufacture won’t respond about warranty, sure they would if I were making an order.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with good sound
customer_reviews.text: Boughtva 2nd one since my teen loved the first one so much. Really good sound, good battery life and comfortable. Use on shorter plane trips instead of my Bose because of size.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you are using it with an Android device
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work with my Moto g7, something I should have known before buying since this is a common problem. Would not recommend buying if you have an Android. It did work with my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Larson

customer_reviews.title: Long charge and great reception / plastic cracked after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! Great quality and no interference EDIT FOR 3 STARS: The plastic cracked away next to the charging port. The design isn't great to keep these intact. I'm pretty disappointed as they are only a few months old.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Static Noise and malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound,External noise cancellation and battery life.The problem!?... I bought JBL Reflect Mini 2 around one month ago and starting with static noise and malfunction of one side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were great--until they crashed
customer_reviews.text: For about a month, they worked great. Synced perfectly with my Apple Watch; good sound quality; calls came through clearly. Then they just stopped working. Trying to get a replacement pair. Will see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: SS_LI

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst headphones I have ever purchased. A Prius driving by will drown out the audio. The bluetooth connection is intermittent, at best. I can't believe these are JBL. DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and wireless convenience
customer_reviews.text: Lost a pair my son gave me for Christmas last year. Purchased these as a replacement and are working well.
customer_reviews.author: JimB

customer_reviews.title: Fits great for running
customer_reviews.text: Use for running fit and sound is great but the control buttons do not always work. Use with Garmin music watch and volume control and song changing does not always work.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Toups

customer_reviews.title: much better sound than the privious version
customer_reviews.text: The JBL Reflect Mini 2 have a much better sound and design than the JBL Reflect Mini BT. No comparison!.
customer_reviews.author: rockyowego

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you own a new Android device.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do not and will never work with new Android devices.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Bought in May 2019. Had good sound but weren’t as loud as I was hoping as I use them when operating my mower. In the middle of August 2019 speakers are at about 10% volume. $70 headphones that last 3-4 months...
customer_reviews.author: Elite Outdoor

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used only once and has already spoiled! Is not working anymore!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camila B

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good but uncomfortable if you wear it for too long
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is pretty nice, but for someone like me who likes to listen to music at work and earbuds can stay in my ear for up to 6,7 hours, it gets uncomfortable. I switched back to my wired ones after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jia tong

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: When you find the perfect fit with the ear pieces, the sound is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: If you only want sound out of one earbud, this ones for you
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed that after only 4 months of minimal use, now only have sound out of one earbud. Normally I prefer JBL over others. But cannot say that any more.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Volume could be higher
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. The volume doesn’t seem to go very high. Cancels out most noise but not all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K

customer_reviews.title: Value for money is reasonable when sold with discount
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the basic cheap variety headphones. Buttons do not have the indicated functions when used with an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Nice buds
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I wear them at the gym and they stay in place while working out. Good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Use for both sports(gym/running)and calls. These are by far the best sound and fit. Used several types in the past last was the JBL reflect mini first generation which where ok, these are much better sound and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jockum

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Android
customer_reviews.text: It is a shame that the fact that this is not compatible with Android is not listed in the product description.....
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit. The ear parts that you start off with fit me just fine and I have really small ears so that really surprised me. Really shiny so I probably won’t loose em😂
customer_reviews.author: Daquan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, weird compability.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality earbuds, great sound. Could not pair to two different pixel 2 xl phones. Weird compability issue I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a chump for buying this.
customer_reviews.text: Will not pair. Will not even show up on iphone, android, nothing. Return policy is painful at best. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Corkey Langston

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after three months. Second issue with this line of JBL headphones. I use them very heavily for cycling, running, and lifting. Do not buy if you intend to too. They will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Zech

customer_reviews.title: GALAXY S20 FE DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: They won't connect to a Galaxy S20 FE, don't find out the hard way like me.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection not reliable and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheap compared to the previous version...will no longer buy JBL Reflect Mini’s
customer_reviews.author: DMitch

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones come with 3 sizes of earbuds and the sound quality is pretty good. They are not active noise canceling, bud do a good job of isolating outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: They sound amazing, and have great bass. I wish they had a little better ability to stay in my ears, though.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working about a week after I got them. Not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Atif Chaudhry

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t have magnetic clips, so very an practical to have it out of the spot facility
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best price for great quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for active sport people great design, nice looking and sound quality is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Abdalla Gad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best value for money in-ear headphones you can get for sport activity
customer_reviews.author: Idan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, fit is great. Volume doesn't get very very loud, but loud enough for me. All in all, great headphones, best I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Alon Geri

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and Surprised
customer_reviews.text: New version would not pair with my new LG phone, so I returned for full refund after calling customer support. I've had one pair of these in the older style that I wore out... They were good for two and a half years.
customer_reviews.author: Minding my time

product_meta.title: JBL Reflect Mini 2 Wireless in-Ear Sport Headphones with Three-Button Remote and Microphone - Black
product_meta.description: JBL signature sound The world renowned JBL sound that has been perfected for over 70 years tuned to provide the most epic sounding soundtrack for your active life. 10 hour battery life with speed charge wireless Bluetooth streams audio for 10 hours to keep you rocking from a morning gym session all the way through a full day’s out. Quickly recharge the battery in 15 minutes for an hour of playback time. Lightweight featherweight, durable aluminum construction for long lasting comfort in all of your athletic or everyday activities. Button remote with microphone and Voice assistant with the touch of a button, easily manage your music or calls and conveniently access voice assistants. Ergonomic ear tips flexible silicone ear tips and patented free bit enhancers that both come in 3 different sizes allow for ultimate customization by mix and matching sizes to find the perfect fit and audio performance. Sweatproof Ramp up the intensity of your workouts without fear. Boasting an IPX5 water-resistant rating, these headphones are built to last the most intense workouts. Reflective cables designed for ultimate visibility at night.
feature_bullets: Designed for movement. Defined by you take on every workout with wireless
Three sizes of Freebie enhancers and have easy control over music and calls
Secure fit The dual lock technology
Ergonomic ear tips flexible silicone ear tips and patented Freebie enhancers
3-Button remote with microphone and voice assistant

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars234 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
